mapper.select: select f.*,r.resumeJor,r.resumeWorks,r.resumeEducation,u.userRealName,u.userGender,u.userBirthday from follow f,resume r,user u where f.followId=#{followId} and u.id=r.userId and u.id=f.byFollowId and f.followStartType=2
select * from follow f,company c,companyintroduction ci where f.followId=#{userId} and f.byFollowId=c.id and c.id=ci.companyId and f.followStartType=1
select count(*) from follow where followId=#{followId}
select count(*) from follow where byFollowId=#{byFollowId}
select * from follow where followId=#{followId} and byFollowId=#{byFollowId}
